full_summary:
### Cleaning Services Contract for the Embassy of Canada to Saudi Arabia

#### Solicitation Details

* **Title:** Cleaning Services for the Embassy of Canada to Saudi Arabia, Riyadh
* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01024892
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** 23-232219
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-07
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-09T14:00:00

#### Contract Overview

The Embassy of Canada to Saudi Arabia is seeking a contractor to provide comprehensive cleaning services for the Chancery location in Riyadh. The scope of work includes overall cleanliness, decent working conditions for approximately 70 occupants, and is expected to be fulfilled according to industry standards.

Key aspects of the contract include:

* Cleaning services for approximately 3,000 m² area covering the Chancery main building and additional facilities
* Provision of labor, supervision, cleaning materials, supplies, uniforms, and equipment required to carry out the work
* Compliance with industry standards for cleanliness and working conditions

#### Attachment and Resources

Refer to the following documents for a detailed understanding of the solicitation and requirements:

* [ cleaners checklist and requirements ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/92deb97a132db656633ae74b3bae4b94/23-232219_-_attachment_1_-_bidders_checklist.pdf)
* [ Request for Proposal document ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/07/ab308ab943cf7f8d0cf270dc04ccc1b9/23-232219_-_rfp_-_en.pdf)
* [ Addendum ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/07/b3ea96007fd5d4562972c9942b816bf5/23-232219_-_addendum_001_-_en.pdf)

For further information, please contact:

* Patrick Belley, [internationalproposals@international.gc.ca](mailto:internationalproposals@international.gc.ca)

#### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2023-02-07
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-09T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not
